website_summaries.verdict: This affordable bill counter may not have all the latest counterfeit sensors, but it's still a workhorse when it comes to counting and batching paper money.
pros: Compact design doesn't take up much room
Detects half, double, and chain notes

customer_reviews.title: Make it rain!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank. I recommend it for counting all the dollars out before you hit the gentleman’s club. Then make it rain with the exact amount of cash. Don’t let those girls take ya for all your worth.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Did not catch fake bills well.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t catch counterfeits often, even after I made one out of loose leaf paper. Thanks to amazon for taking it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo Kung

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I donated it to our chrch to help count offerings. The only problem I really ever have is when the bills are very wrincled.
customer_reviews.author: Glen D. Geen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our church to count weekly money. While it can jam on crumpled bills, it's way faster than hand counting and simply running things through twice verified the numbers instead of two people counting them by hand twice. Wonderful addition for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: sss

customer_reviews.title: Great for counting bill quantities
customer_reviews.text: I work at a laundry mat and people come in to pay with one dollar bills. It's hard and annoying to count them at the end of the week, that's where this counter comes handy. It works great and has a fake bill recognizing system. It does not tell you the amount, so you can't count mixed bills for the totals, but separated bills are perfect for it. Its accurate and so far has not jammed. And I ran 2000 dollars worth of singles through it 3 times. So I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: helina L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product however needed value counter
customer_reviews.text: This appeared to be a great product. Unfortunately I had to return this item because it did not have value counting/mixed denominations ability. Due to that it did not meet my church's accountant needs. The return was great, I was advanced my return prior to the receipt of the item. I would definitely vouch for the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron T.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my close buds was tying the knot and what better way to celebrate his self inflicted suicide other than throwing him a party of epic proportions... this lil device here was a LIFE SAVER and saved me a lot of time and headache. It quickly and accurately counted thousands and thousands of dollars. Even if the bills were covered with Victoria’s Secret scented lotion, glitter, and only god knows what else. Further more the fraud detection feature caught some funny money trying to cycle thru. Believe me, the last thing i wanted to do is argue with the ladies of the night paired with the god of all hangovers. Anyways, for the price it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: So fast and accurate !
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a must for business owner ! I didn’t think about this when I first had the business but with all the small bills, it would taking me forever to count them and it took so much time. Finally I gave in to buy this to hopefully help me take off the stress and this thing sure does ! It works so fast and so accurate !! It was easy to set and to use. I have not tried on fake bills so I can’t vow for that function but everything else is a must buy !!! I love it. My video will show you how fast it counts
customer_reviews.author: Thuy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This a good quality money counter. It has a lot of good settings. You can use it to count a select number of bills at a time. It has lots of counting setting to choose from. While using it didn’t skip bills and did well counting the bills without problems or jamming. Overall this is better quality then expected. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly- Counting with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great price & EASY to use! It does ALL OF THE SAME functions as other machines w/out the price hike! It counts the bills, has a counterfeit detector, but doesn't have a sum total function. VERY HAPPY with purchase! Sort the denominations and go!
customer_reviews.author: Whtizitall4

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fast.
customer_reviews.text: This is as easy as connecting the plug and turning the switch on. After that you can set for batch, where it counts up to a certain increment. There is 25,50,100 so makes it easy. The other is counting what you put in. All you do is put the money in too and flip back and the machine does the rest. My husband laughed at me as I did it over and over trying to see how accurate it was. It was right 100% of the time. It had s so fast just like the banks have.
customer_reviews.author: The real Nickie Penn

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate and sturdy. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is solid and sturdy, not cheap plastic, in fact it's almost heavy. I've used it several times since I've purchased it and it has worked perfectly, 100%. It only "jams" or stops counting if the bill is extremely wrinkled. When this happens, I just removed the bill and start the counting process over. This little machine is fast and accurate. The only drawback, if you can call it that, is it cannot differentiate between denominations of money. This machine counts pieces of paper, not dollar amounts. For approximately $80, it's a great deal. I would buy it again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Obicorey

customer_reviews.title: Works 90%
customer_reviews.text: About 90% of the time, this thing is awesome. Unfortunately, sometimes the plastic cover becomes loose, and then the money jams. A lot. Unless you know that you can just snap that back into place and it will work much better it can be very frustrating. I never use the Detection feature, so I cannot speak to that. But it counts money like it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dahlbeck

customer_reviews.title: The next bill can be retained in the machine after a completed batch count
customer_reviews.text: Say if you have 101 bills and you want the machine to count a batch of 100 bills. The 101th bill will be trapped so you have to make sure to click [S]tart to push it out. This machine only counts how many bills you have, not the total sum. So you have to sort the 1's, 5's, 10's and 20's beforehand. Sometimes I'll have a $10 in the $20s pile and the machine will just count how many physical bills there are, which is exactly all I need. If you want the total sum, you'll have to buy a pricier counter with more complicated features.
customer_reviews.author: cookies20095

customer_reviews.title: 🤩 Supper Accurate And Easy To Use 🤩
customer_reviews.text: Great machine super easy to use and very accurate makes closing at the end of the day a whole lot easier
customer_reviews.author: David Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Unboxing and getting this setup was a cinch. With my daughter helping unbox we pretty much got this thing up and running and less than a minute. Just plug and stick bills in it. We ran 11 bills thru it with accurate results for testing purposes as in the vid. U can batch bundles in 25, 50, and 100 stacks... we run a small business so this will make counting our deposits a breeze.!.
customer_reviews.author: ViN

customer_reviews.title: My little time-saving friend
customer_reviews.text: Years later thankfully this guy is still working for me. It does not detect counterfeits well, but it did catch 1-2 fakes & let 3-4 other fake bills go undetected. Only issue is the display panel comes lose sometimes if you hold it incorrectly, making the wiring get disconnected. It is very frustrating to connect again. I had to cut a little plastic off so I could reconnect easier.
customer_reviews.author: hman

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for efficiency
customer_reviews.text: As a cash primary business, I needed a solution to quickly count my daily totals. This money counter has definitely simplified the process as it can count a large stack of bills within a few seconds. The construction of the money counter itself is great, it feels very durable and is heavy enough to not shift around while in use. I have not encountered any jams with it as of yet, it appears to handle bills that are crinkled fairly well. Overall for the price I am very pleased with the money counter as it has greatly improved the efficiency in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: G ooooo d
customer_reviews.text: Works super well !! This device is made super well . It is very heavy . Very good for your small business. The couting is also great . It does not break my Bill's or count wrong . The design is just awesome! Overall great just great
customer_reviews.author: AWSTECH

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have used the machine about 4 times. It constantly jams. Can't count 25 ones without trying several times. I think it is not right. Now I am 8 days past my return time, I guess I have to try to use the warranty to get it checked out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how fast and accurate the machine worked! The only thing was that it counts how many physical bills are in the hopper, regardless if it’s a $1,$2, $5, $10 etc. But a way to get around that is to separate the bills and check them that way. It’s great to use as a double check!
customer_reviews.author: Thy

customer_reviews.title: This won't detect even the most obviously fake bills. ...
customer_reviews.text: This won't detect even the most obviously fake bills. Buy one with Magnetic detection, as this one won't catch anything.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Useful machine wish I could count it everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is a great counting machine even tho I never had one before, but I read lots of comments on different machine. I know a bit what to expect. So far I cannot find any flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Chia Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Wow! How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I never thought I'd want one and now that I have it, I could never do without it. Always counts accurate very fast and once you get the hang of loading it, it is a breeze. Money rarely gets stuck and if it does it is easily fixed
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable billcounter. I tested it many times with 100 1 dollar bills I got for Chinese New year and it's fast and accurate everytime. At only a hundred dollars it's an amazing value. I love that it is no set up required
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and super simple to use. It is really massive and well made, parts seems to be good quality and not cheap as I thought it will be. All the tests that I run was 100% accurate and I didn’t run into a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mordi

customer_reviews.title: Quick cash counter
customer_reviews.text: We got this since my husband has a side business besides his normal job and his customers are usually paying him in cash. This makes counting the money each week much faster. We haven’t had it miscount yet! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a personal purchase, it looks good. Haven't tried it as of yet I'm going to try it when I need to make use of it
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: This is the machine of machines. I've had it for about one year and it miscounted only once. It saves me a ton of time and work. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonyelmocano

customer_reviews.title: Fast and simple Money counter
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and reliable. I haven't gotten a chance to try the fake bill detector because I didn't have one on me but the machine is very simple to use with all the functions that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: lapwang

customer_reviews.title: Worse counter out there
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make counting currency easier. I have lost at least 2500 dollars from using this machine it doesn’t count accurate or close to it always shorts or counts extra do not buy
customer_reviews.author: MrLa

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The machine counts bills as you put them in, it DOES not sort them , you'll have to enter the denominator manually, it also does NOT detect fake bills, overall I am happy with how quickly the machine counts , its very quiet and has not jammed up.
customer_reviews.author: ant

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable money counter for our small business and this turned out perfect. I've had it for a month now and I have no complaints at all. It's been accurate every time when counting. Very reliable product at great price! I am planning on purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Personal / Not Business
customer_reviews.text: Works well for personal stuff. Will not be the most convenient for businesses counting plenty of bills that aren't very neat.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great counter
customer_reviews.text: We handle a lot of the low value currency and this machine is perfect for us. It is small, efficient, easy to operate, runs quickly and was very affordable. We’re been using it regularly with no trouble at all. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: get a better counter
customer_reviews.text: this broke the same day the top part is not secured and easy 2 break off
customer_reviews.author: brandie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So everything is going well. This money counter come with a good package. Easy to to use. it’s made our task so much easier. We use for a small business so it’s so perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: YvetteC

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. If the bills are older it will get jammed. Pretty accurate. Careful opening the lid the wires are too short and mine unsnapped and I had to take it apart and put it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Angelista

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too fast to be perfectly accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my church. It counts the money extremely fast, but it has miscounted a few times. Maybe haste makes waste. I rather it be accurate than fast. I always run the money thru twice to be certain. It was a great deal. Can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Counting bills
customer_reviews.text: This is really better than I thought it would be.. even though it only counts bills and doesn’t distinguish them... very fast and accurate! If you’re looking for one of these units I would recommend at 100% for the price. It’s very heavy and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Graybeal

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Our grand olde money counter finally bit the dust, but as it was only used roughly once a week, I figured we'd give this counter a go. It's been excellent so far, none of the frequent jams that plagued it's predecessor and it's easy to use. Time will tell how long it lasts, but it feels solidly constructed and I anticipate it will live well past it's warranty [will update if I've been overly optimistic].
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Total Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Does not even count one bill properly. Jams immediately and spits bills out. This was while trying to count Canadian money and the bills are in good shape so I know its the counter thats not working. Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: aMonkstUs

customer_reviews.title: missing power card!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved package and it was opened I sealed it myself because it was a gift to someone for Christmas! They got the counter and loved it as gift only to try to use it yesterday Monday Dec,30 but no power card was in the box! How embarrassing and humiliating. Idk why it didn’t come with one. I’ve been hunting for a power card that fits so that they can enjoy the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not work all the time
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work all the time. I would put in the same amount of bills but it would display different numbers each time. Had to return back
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: made with good material, works with counterfeit bills discards them, makes little noise and is very fast
customer_reviews.author: dalitza alvarado de figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loves its! Easy to use, easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to count the tips for the restaurant that I work in. We got a lot of dollar bills. This money counter make my life easier. It counts money very fast and accurate. It will be great if it can sum the total value. But everything else works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the value...would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The Kilobri Money Counter was very easy to set and use...saves alot of time counting by hand and very accurate...
customer_reviews.author: Bob horsch

customer_reviews.title: Great company even better product
customer_reviews.text: First one got lost in the mail, but company sent another one and that i appreciate. Product itself works perfectly good. I have actually never had a miscount with it. Makes life way easier.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash R. Samaroo

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for the price! It has saved me so much time as I have 2 small retail stores and it was taking me forever to count the money. Now I just separate by denomination and let the machine do it's thing. I've had it 3 months so far and it has been working well!
customer_reviews.author: DesignerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I was looking for, very easy to use and extremely accurate. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: don m

customer_reviews.title: Fizzled after five months
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with my purchase for about five months. Then abruptly, it quit working. After about five bills, the counter gets stuck. Again and again. It's not even a repeat thing. It's every time. This is under warranty, but it's frustrating trying to find where to go to even get service.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRICE AND WORK REALLY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: GOOD STUFF WORK FINE... REALLY GOOD PRICE.. ITS WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Wow, counts faster than the speed if light, what a freat product, i go thru lots of singles in my business and safes me a lot of time. 🙌👍
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Major Asset to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and fast. Fantastic value for the money. We run gymnastics meets and it was a pain to count all the cash by hand and then again to recheck. This turned typically 2 hours of work into 15 minutes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the UV counterfeit feature and dont like that batch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient and works without issue. I do not like the UV counterfeit feature and dont like that batch counting can't be changed. Ultimately, the price versus value is a good proposition.
customer_reviews.author: Nkasper

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, very accurate, I like it. No more hand count all the one dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Renchuan Kong

customer_reviews.title: It's super fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift for my boyfriend who owns his own business. He loves it and it really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and a customer brought it back as been defective. I tested the product out it does not work the screen when plugged in and turned on does not light up. Can I please return this product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: M&M Feed and Supply, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Faster if you just count with hands. Always restarts your count too!
customer_reviews.text: Would he faster if you just count with your hands. Stupid! If there is a little crease, it will RESTART the ENTIRE ACOUNT! Lol! Takes me way faster to just run my finger thru my money.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The best money counter I have ever purchased. Great seller and very reliable. I will purchase more in the future for my businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Does exactly as it is described. Bought this for a concession stand. Absolutely love it. Makes counting money so much easier. Well worth the money. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa DeShazo

customer_reviews.title: Best Money counter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and works as well as a more expensive model. The only counter in my stores
customer_reviews.author: M. Sobelman

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Please cover up the package before send it out! It is sensitive item. Otherwise all good.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyD

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: "I would rate it an 11 if I could!" My boyfriends exact words. Needless to say he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Only counts. Does not do the math. Still a good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect just wish it actually counted 5s 10s 20s 50s and 100s all bunched up together. Other them that, it give you the number of bills you put into the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bleron

customer_reviews.title: counter
customer_reviews.text: My coworker loves it. Makes her job a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna Crosby

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: It is as pictured. The instructions are easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: angel tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good counter if you need a quick count of a single denomination. We have a mini-mart and use the counter to count up or prep our daily tills.
customer_reviews.author: MatthewB

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return
customer_reviews.text: Hi There, Used it couple of times to test after getting it delivered and the bills got ripped every time we tried and would like to return. Please advise on how to return and get a refund. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: The Walnut Room, Tustin CA 92780

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This money counter has been great in our office. A real help!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I love it...does bundles in 10, 100 etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard M.

customer_reviews.title: discription not clear. Therefore bought it and found not ...
customer_reviews.text: discription not clear . Therefore bought it and found not suitable for my uses.Other than that I will rate them with 5 stars for resolving my issue.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy boon

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS GREAT !!
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS ! I have had it quite a while and only maybe one jam. PERFECT !
customer_reviews.author: Donna T.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bill counter. Very fast and easy to use. So far it's been accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pham

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this counter to help me with business and it didn't even last a month. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: just lost $50.00 due to relied on this for counterfeit bill.
customer_reviews.text: did not detect it..and lost $50.00 ..so make sure you are just using this to count bills.
customer_reviews.author: kalp

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I have been sent a replacement, and the replacement is broke too. Need refund and pickup this piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Bepperson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Are use it every day it’s a great item to have very accurate very durable
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 years before it went out on me. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Morris

customer_reviews.title: ... machine told you the dollar amount it would be better.
customer_reviews.text: If this machine told you the dollar amount it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: it did not detect a fake $100 and I lost $100
customer_reviews.text: The machine did not detect a fake $100 bill and it caused me $100 loss in my business.
customer_reviews.author: shilla

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work accurate and miss counts.
customer_reviews.text: Package came wit a preview of money counter outside of the box. So unprofessional. That gives people some money ideas when they see that type of stuff outside of a home.
customer_reviews.author: Dre’

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected,but i'll live with it
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in this simply because i thought the money counter would show the exact money amount on the screen. I didn't want the number of bills.I don't like doing math and don't like counting. I just was looking forward for a money counter to do all the work. It does a good job in the fact of counting the bills yes how many. It sometimes gets jammed with a bill but you can easily take it out and recount. Make sure all bills are stacked properly and folded properly 100%. Thought about returning it after my disappointment,but didn't want to go through the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ortega

customer_reviews.title: You'll never go back to counting money by hand!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute workhorse! Worth it's weight in gold a true quality pics of machinery! Haven't had a miscount since I've purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex STEPANIAN

customer_reviews.title: Its a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Effective inexpensice counter, with batch and fake bill detection. Simple to use and reduces time counting dirty bills with your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Pabs

customer_reviews.title: It is the first counter I have and I find ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the first counter I have and I find it very fast, but it has miscounted a few times. I suggest runnig the money thru twice to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Received the money counter but no power chord!
customer_reviews.text: Received my money counter and there is no power chord with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Kilobi bill counter
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective Unable to detect counterfeit bills Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thank God I bought insurance on this. I bought 2 of them and both ruined within the first week
customer_reviews.author: Zein

customer_reviews.title: Good time saver if you count lots of bills
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Very helpful in counting up bills for our business. A lot quicker than when we used to count by hand. Do wish I had paid a little more attention to the product description as it counts notes but doesn't provide a total of the money which is what I really wanted but that's on me, not this product. Counterfeit detection is helpful although have noticed that if you have a torn note repaired with sticky tape it stops and identifies as counterfeit. Overall a good time saver if you have lots of bills to count
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to be cheap for the price, wow was I wrong great product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!! Smooth operating
customer_reviews.text: SO far....perfect!! Smooth operating,quiet,accurate...I love it!! I hope I don't need warranty!
customer_reviews.author: sobeit

customer_reviews.title: my fault for being cheap🤦🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months this time I’m gonna spend more and get something better
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Compact - smaller than it looks - with metal where ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact - smaller than it looks - with metal where should be, reliable. The only issue is that the counter should reset once the stacker is empty, without the irritating need to push the S button. Update: the lack of a sensor in the stacker can drive one crazy. You find yourself struggling with the machine, pressing the S button all the time, or letting it continue counting in case you forget to push the button. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Harel

customer_reviews.title: Works Geat!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the smaller size makes it nice size to sit on a desk.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: i need my money back
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting it to just count the way it does .
customer_reviews.author: latrina kennell

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with the performance
customer_reviews.text: The machine makes to many mistakes while counting, I'm not happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kolibri Money Counter with Counterfeit Bill Detection, Bill Counting Machine with 1-year warranty
product_meta.description:
Size:1-(Pack)

Money counting made easy with with the Kolibri automatic bill counter - this money counter will count up to 1,000 bills per minute and features batch mode, allowing you to batch in units of 10, 20, 25, 50, or 100 bills. The Kolibri will also detect half, chain, double, and counterfeit bills with built in sensors, including UV. We are one of the only low-cost bill counters to offer a one-year warranty on parts and labor, not 30 days like most of our competition.

The Kolibri automatic bill counter comes in easy-to-open, high quality packaging and won't smell overpoweringly of used tires like some other low-cost money counters. If you're looking for a reliable money counter for your home or business, you can choose the Kolibri bill counter with confidence.

Features: 

Batch mode with convenient preset batch units counts 1000 bills/min half note detection double note detection chain note detection UV paper quality detection against counterfeits 1 year warranty on parts and service
feature_bullets: Warranty: A full 1-year warranty means you can purchase with confidence.
Detection: UV, half, double, and chain notes are all detected by the Kolibri money counter while counting 1,000 bills per minute.
Quality: durable metal construction makes this bill counter easy to clean and maintain, and a straight bill path means fewer jams than the competition.
Ease of use: automatic start, stop, and error clearing functions make money counting simple. High quality sensors and motor mean no continuous run time limits.
Size: 9” x 11” x 5” - a compact, powerful, and robust money counting machine. Be sure to check out our video on the left, under the last image , Hopper Capacity - 200 bills uncirculated
